queries.query: select lancamentoInputCols from LancamentoInputColsEntity lancamentoInputCols join fetch lancamentoInputCols.lancamentoInput lancamentoInput join fetch lancamentoInputCols.arquivoInputColsDef arquivoInputColsDef where lancamentoInput.id = :lancamentoInputId order by lancamentoInputCols.id

select lancamentoInputCols from LancamentoInputColsEntity lancamentoInputCols join fetch lancamentoInputCols.lancamentoInput lancamentoInput join fetch lancamentoInputCols.arquivoInputColsDef arquivoInputColsDef join fetch arquivoInputColsDef.arquivoInput arquivoInput where arquivoInput.id = :arquivoInputId order by lancamentoInputCols.id
